metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2318 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: There are use-after-free vulnerabilities caused by timer handler innet/rose/rose_timer.c of linux that allow attackers to crash linux kernelwithout any privileges.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
